job_description:
Job Description:
1. Support Lean Maturity assessment and implementation planning across material receiving, production, and shipment processes.
2. Assist in designing and executing standardized work procedures, 5S initiatives, and visual management systems across production operations.
3. Develop and implement Lean project improvements focusing on TPM, pull system optimization, SMED equipment flexibility, and defect prevention systems.

Requirements:
1. Major in Industrial Engineer and related fields
2. Strong foundation in Lean Manufacturing and continuous improvement, including TPM, SMED, and process optimization. 
3. Skilled in process flow analysis, bottleneck identification, and performance measurement (OEE, waste reduction). 
4. Experienced in training program design, project management, and cross-functional collaboration. 
5. Knowledgeable in lean transformation projects, manufacturing process optimization, and documentation standardization.
